content.question: Which of the following would most likely occur if cattle lost the ability to maintain a colony of microorganisms in their digestive tract?

choices.label: Cattle would no longer be able to synthesize cellulose.
Cattle would have to convert cellulose to starch before digesting it.
Cattle would have to start producing enzyme <math alttext="B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mi>B</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> without the help of the bacteria.
Cattle would no longer be able to use cellulose as a primary source of glucose.

content.answer: Cattle would no longer be able to use cellulose as a primary source of glucose.

skill.text: 6.E: Predict the causes or effects of a change in, or disruption to, one or more components in a biological system.
